entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
